name: Bay View Financial
overview:
Since our establishment more than two decades ago, Bayview Financial has grown from a small advisory firm to a full service mortgage finance company specializing in under-served areas of the real estate markets. We provide a wide range of products and services, including residential and commercial special servicing, residential and commercial mortgage and securities investing, and small balance commercial mortgage origination. We source our business through a network of thousands of financial institutions, mortgage companies, third party brokers and advisors throughout the U.S.

Since 1998, Bayview companies have issued over $27 billion in asset-backed securities, consisting of loans acquired from third parties and loans we have originated ourselves. Today, Bayview is one of the largest financial institutions headquartered in Florida.
